title: What Size Rug Do I Need for My Living Room?
sub_head: Interior designers lay down the five crucial points to consider—from where the furniture goes to how much floor to show—when buying a carpet
body:
INTERIOR DESIGN experts love to say there are no rules in the decorating process, citing increasingly popular anything-goes aesthetics. But ask a design pro about living room rugs and suddenly they’re all about mandates, from size and shape to material and furniture placement. Here, their guidelines.
The universal bugaboo seems to be skimpiness. “When a rug is too small, it creates distracting broken space between the rug and the furniture surrounding it,” said New York designer Jackie Young. Vivian Torres, lead designer for online interior design resource Havenly, recommends you get the largest size a living room can accommodate.
